summary: The Wise Man's Tree, a playlist by Lea Sielski on Spotify
body:
The Wise Man’s Tree, a playlist by Lea Sielski on Spotify

I recently reread one of my favourite fanfics of all time: “The wise man’s tree”, by @curriebelle. And who could have guessed, I’m still a sappy Perc'ahlia shipper with a weak spot for period dramas and mysterious haunted houses. Following the only logical conclusion, I made a playlist to fit the mood :D

reblog.comment:

summary: [id: a drawing of Jester Lavorre from the knees up. She's holding a pink and purple lollipop in her hand, and looking off to the...
body:
[id: a drawing of Jester Lavorre from the knees up. She’s holding a pink and purple lollipop in her hand, and looking off to the side and grinning. Beneath her is a banner that says “JESTER LAVORRE” in all caps.]

i’m only on like episode 7 i think but oh my GOD i fell in love INSTANTLY with this character

also this is available as a sticker on my redbubble!!! :)

summary: You know who’d I’d love to see making a cameo in CR2? An older Allura Vysoren, who grew to be happy and fulfilled in her work...
body: You know who’d I’d love to see making a cameo in CR2? An older Allura Vysoren, who grew to be happy and fulfilled in her work and never had to fight in another battle again, and Lady Kima of Vord, her loving and caring wife who never leaves her side and they’re both happy and healthy and make tea and do paint by number together and are cute and domestic and the M9 find them and they’re just like “Oh, good, more young adventurers” and give them advice and tea and I’d just really like to see Kimallura old and happy

summary: I’m so looking forward to the fallout from the bloody business at the end of the last Critical Role, but there’s one particular...
body:
I’m so looking forward to the fallout from the bloody business at the end of the last Critical Role, but there’s one particular reaction I’m interested in.

Did the Traveller approve? And what would Jester think if he did?

summary:
You know what thought made me emotional? 
The thought that now a future live shows everyone is going to sing the intro. I love...
body:
You know what thought made me emotional?


The thought that now a future live shows everyone is going to sing the intro. I love hose moments when people gather and sing with passion to a great song….


So for the future live show…please record it if it happens

blog.name: beingatoaster
blog.title: If life gives you toasters, make toast!
blog.description:
LG/Lyse/birdzilla/Toaster/whatever else you care to call me. I'm in my early thirties, hail from the southeastern United States, and like to think I can write. My life is work/gym/role-playing/Tumblr. This should not be mistaken for a well-organized blog. I run an untagged queue.
Most Flight Rising stuff is over at @needlenubbins.

summary: I was listening to CR on the way here and Grog rolled a 20 on a con save against Craven Edge, then realized he was at...
body:
I was listening to CR on the way here and Grog rolled a 20 on a con save against Craven Edge, then realized he was at disadvantage and rolled a 1….

and then I pulled into work and now I have to wait eight hours to find out what happens next D:

summary: I know I don’t post a whole lost about my personal life, but I want to let everyone know that yesterday I finished my Bachelor’s...
caption: I know I don’t post a whole lost about my personal life, but I want to let everyone know that yesterday I finished my Bachelor’s of Science! Several of you have been there for the long journey and have been an enormous help along the way.  Thank you to all of you. Now onto my next adventure.

summary: I know I’m late to the party...
title: I know I’m late to the party...

But I just started watching Critical Role

I decided to start with Season 2 because brand new characters, brand new campaign and uh

I am already a little in love with all of them, but especially Beau and Yasha

Ok that is all

summary: i drew jester yesterday while i was watching C1 and look at this sweet girl!!! i really like how it turned out and i hope you...
body:
i drew jester yesterday while i was watching C1 and look at this sweet girl!!! i really like how it turned out and i hope you all do too!!

[image description: a portrait of a blue skinned tielfling girl from the shoulders up. she has bob length blue hair and small black curved horns with a silver cap on the ends of them. She has purple eyes and freckles. she also is wearing a silver earring]
